summary: The SPRINT_PLANNING_ARCHITECT clarified limitations on backlog modifications, confirming it can only use and update existing stories, and proposed Sprint SP-003 to address Supabase/SQLite crashes and login integration by re-executing US-016, US-010, and US-001.

decisions.title: Adjusted approach using existing stories
decisions.details: No new stories like US-017 will be added; instead, re-execute existing stories US-016, US-010, and US-001 to fix crashes, consolidate routes, and enable testable local SQLite setup without Supabase.

actions.task: Approve SP-003 or suggest tweaks to stories
Upon approval, save sprint SP-003 and update story statuses via http_post, then execute if ready
Test the application post-execution by running setup.py and app.py to verify no crashes and functional login to dashboard

backlog_deltas.title: Local SQLite Fix & Login Integration using existing stories US-016, US-010, US-001

risks.risk: Application code may remain fragmented or require further cleanup after sprint execution
risks.mitigation: Initiate a requirements meeting to add new stories like US-017 for comprehensive refactoring if issues persist post-testing
